DOC.brief_summary: Literature suggest route feed and/or certain nutrient may cause alteration body 's immune cell . Immune cell help protect body fight infection/disease . Tube feeding ( TF ) method deliver nutrition directly stomach/intestines via small tube . The immune system may respond differently receive continuous TF compare receive intermittent TF . Heart rate variability ( HRV , interval heartbeat ) measurement nervous system 's response stress/illness . The difference immune cell and/or HRV may influence body reacts complication infection .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Enteral Versus Parenteral Feeding Healthy Human Subjects
DOC.criteria: General good health demonstrate medical history , physical & laboratory test Age 18 40 year Written inform consent prior performance study related procedure History cancer , rheumatoid arthritis , immunological , renal , hepatic , endocrine , neurologic , heart disease hypertension Any medication take past 48 hr ( except birth control ) Recent history alcohol drug abuse Unable provide write informed consent Exposure experimental agent procedure within 30 day study Pregnant breastfeeding
